name: Tension Field 01
description:
This video loop was created with a generative system where each pixel calculates its own gray value based on distance and relative angle to three randomly placed points. Part of an ongoing exploration of a system with simple rules but endless possibilities...

1080 x 1080 px > 30 sec > 900 frames

Made with Processing and GLSL. 

TW: @solaas | IG: @leonardo_solaas
